title: (x) "Biertje" script-like serif face in Heineken ad - Heineken {Gary Schmidt}
content:
Does anyone know of a good font that looks very much like this one? I believe this is a custom font for Heineken? But it looks like it’s based on a classic font. I just can’t seem to recognize which font this is.

Regards,  
®ené

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [800x600\_biertje.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062501/http:/typophile.com/files/800x600_biertje.jpg) | 35.27 KB |

 [‹ (x) Lucky Strike logo - custom (similar to Futura Cond) {Marten, Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36665 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Federal Credit Union sans caps - Futura Cond (stretched) {Tiff, Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36646 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Characters

comments.content: [Heineken](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062501/http:/www.dafont.com/heineken.font) will probably do the trick, but I’ve had no personal experience with it.
Thnx Gary, it works like a charm.
